title: How to Wirelessly Access your Mac's File on iOS|Android|Windows
tags: Wirelessly browse your Mac files from iOS|Android|Windows
How to access your Mac's file From iOS|Android|Windows
How to Browse your Mac's File From iOS|Android|Windows
How to Browse your Mac's Hard Drives From iOS|Android|Windows
description: Do you want to stream movies on your Mac from your other devices?  Do you want to transfer Files from Mac to other devices?   Well here is a simple (and a little known) way to browse files on your Mac from any other devices under the same network. And the best part is you don't have to download any software, just make sure both your Mac and the other device is on the same network.  In this video, we'll see how to browse your Mac's Hard Drives from iOS|Android|Windows. All you have to do is turn on File sharing on your Mac and that's it. It's that simple.
